name: SoulsDub
description: SouldDub was created especially for fans of HARDCORE gamers. A cosmic threat is moving to earth, alien radishes intend to grind your house into powder. But he attacked the wrong one! You have a couple of loyal friends Lazertron and Firezhor. Currently on board SoulsDub there are 5 juicy levels, 2 tiers of difficulty. And much more .. Tire change by moving to the hub and out. Also, the gameplay is directly tied to the time you spend on the battlefield. I wish you success, the young ones, may the power and the laser pistol be with you!
